char_golot.name: marjorie_golot
char_golot.description: People in this village seem to agree on Mlle Golot: she's strong as an oxen, and kind as a cow.[BREAK]I wouldn't take her for a hotel manager though.[BREAK]Apparently she's a tremendous cook
char_golot.label: Marjorie Golot

char_thierry.name: lamis_thierry
char_thierry.description: She looks grumpy as can be, but is actually helpful and welcoming.[BREAK]Her hotel is well kept and tastefully furnished. She gave me the room with the most gorgeous view.[BREAK]I'm glad I decided to stop here before heading to the Charadeville hospice.
char_thierry.label: Lamis 'Miss' Thierry

char_biquievre.name: adele_biquievre
char_biquievre.description: Suprisingly fit and tough for her age. She seems to have two a long standing loves: motorcycling and baking...
char_biquievre.label: Ad√®le Biquievre
